Package SuffixTree.Java

Class suffixTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • SuffixTree.Java.suffixTree
  • public class suffixTree
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the suffix tree. It also contains the symbol list, from which the suffix tree is created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      suffixTree​(int K)
      Creates a new suffix tree containing only the root vertex and an empty list of integers.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      contextSet add​(int a)
      Adds a new symbol to the symbol list and updates the suffix tree accordingly.
      java.util.ArrayList getL()
      Returns the symbol list from which the suffix tree is created.
      Vertex getRoot()
      Returns the root vertex of the suffix tree.
      int getSizeL()  
      void printCodeTree()
      Produces a simple ascii print of the code tree on sysout.
      void printIndexTree()
      Produces a simple ascii print of the index tree on sysout.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • suffixTree

        public suffixTree​(int K)
        Creates a new suffix tree containing only the root vertex and an empty list of integers.
        Parameters:
        K - The number of symbols in the alphabet

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public contextSet add​(int a)
               throws java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        Adds a new symbol to the symbol list and updates the suffix tree accordingly. The new context set is returned.
        Parameters:
        a - The symbol to be added to the symbol list
        Returns:
        The new context set for the extended symbol list
        Throws:
        java.lang.OutOfMemoryError - If there is not enough store in order to add the new symbol

      • getRoot

        public Vertex getRoot()
        Returns the root vertex of the suffix tree.
        Returns:
        The root vertex of the suffix tree

      • getL

        public java.util.ArrayList getL()
        Returns the symbol list from which the suffix tree is created.
        Returns:
        The symbol list from which the suffix tree is created

      • getSizeL

        public int getSizeL()

      • printCodeTree

        public void printCodeTree()
        Produces a simple ascii print of the code tree on sysout. This is done by traversing the suffix tree in preorder printing all the symbols at the indexes as given in the suffix tree.

      • printIndexTree

        public void printIndexTree()
        Produces a simple ascii print of the index tree on sysout. This is done by traversing the suffix tree in preorder printing all the indexes as given in the suffix tree.
